ASE.ActivateCallLightningCastDescription: Call forth a bolt of lightning from the storm cloud above.
ASE.AddedAtWill: {spellName} has been added to your At-Will spells.
ASE.RemovedAtWill: {spellName} has been removed from your At-Will spells.
ASE.CallLightningChatMessage: {name} darkens the sky with a storm cloud...
ASE.CallLightningFullDamageFlavor: Lightning Bolt Damage Roll Full {damageRoll} Lightning
ASE.CallLightningHalfDamageFlavor: Lightning Bolt Damage Roll Half {damageRoll} Lightning
ASE.PlaceCrackAsTileTooltip: Place a ground-crack tile on the ground where the bolt lands
ASE.DetectTagsTooltip: Enter tags to detect. Separate tags with a comma. Example: tag1, tag2, tag3
ASE.TagNameTooltip: Enter the name of the tag to detect. Example: tag1
ASE.TagEffectTooltip: Enter the Sequencer DB path to the effect to apply to tagged object. Example: jb2a.magic_signs.rune.abjuration.loop.blue
ASE.DetectGoodAnimTooltip: Select the animation to play on object tagged with good
ASE.DetectEvilAnimTooltip: Select the animation to play on object tagged with evil
ASE.DetectPoisonAnimTooltip: Select the animation to play on object tagged with poison
ASE.DetectDiseaseAnimTooltip: Select the animation to play on object tagged with disease
ASE.DetectRangeTooltip: Enter the maximum detection range. Example: 30
ASE.DamageDieCountTooltip: Enter the number of dice to roll for damage. Example: 2
ASE.DamageDieTooltip: Select the type of die to roll for damage
ASE.DamageBonusTooltip: Enter the bonus to add to the damage roll. Example: 2
ASE.OverrideDamageTooltip: Override the damage roll with these values instead
ASE.BeamIntroSoundPlaybackOptionsTooltip: Should the intro sound play for each missile or once for the group?
ASE.BeamImpactSoundDelayTooltip: If Individual, delay will start after animation is complete
ASE.BeamImpactSoundPlaybackOptionsToolti: Should the impact sound play for each missile or once for the group?
ASE.FogCloudRadiusTooltip: The radius of the fog cloud in feet(per spell level if scaling)
ASE.WallOfForceRadiusTooltip: The radius of the wall of force in feet
ASE.WallOfForceSegmentSizeTooltip: The size of each individual segment of the wall of force in feet
ASE.WallOfForcePanelCountTooltip: The number of panels in total when placing manually
ASE.WallOfForceUseWebPTooltip: Use a static image rather than an animated video(enable if experiencing performance issues)
ASE.WallOfForceEndPanelPlacementInstruct: Right click any where on the canvas to end placement
ASE.DartImpactSoundDelayTooltip: If Individual, delay will start after animation is complete
ASE.MoonbeamAlreadyEnteredTile: {name} has already entered this Moonbeam tile this turn
ASE.MoonbeamEnteringTile: {name} is entering the space of a Moonbeam tile
ASE.StartingTurnInMoonbeam: {name} is starting their turn in the space of a moonbeam tile
ASE.MoveMoonbeamDescription: Command your Moonbeam to move up to 60 feet in any direction.
ASE.ScaleWithLevelTooltip: Scale the value with the level of the spell
ASE.RayImpactSoundDelayTooltip: If Individual, delay will start after animation is complete
ASE.SpiritGlowColorTooltip: The color of the glow around the summoning circle
ASE.UseSpiritGlowTooltip: If false, the glow color will be determined by the spirit color
ASE.SpiritAttackItemDescription: Make a melee spell attack using the spiritual weapon.
ASE.SteelWindStrikeDamageFlavor: Steel Wind Strike - Damage Roll (6d10 force)
ASE.DisableSpriteRotationTooltip: Disable the rotation of the sprite during cast
ASE.ThunderStepPassengerPrompt: Select a friend to bring with you! Warning, you will damage everyone in the red circle!
ASE.VampiricTouchDescription: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon force from others to heal your wounds
ASE.VTCasterEffectTooltip: The energy overlay effect on the caster
ASE.VTCasterSoundTooltip: The sound played with the caster effect
ASE.VTCasterSoundDelayTooltip: The delay before the caster sound plays
ASE.VTCasterVolumeTooltip: The volume of the caster sound
ASE.VTSiphonEffectTooltip: The energy strands effect extending from the target to the caster
ASE.VTSiphonSoundTooltip: The sound played with the siphon effect
ASE.VTSiphonSoundDelayTooltip: The delay before the siphon sound plays
ASE.VTSiphonVolumeTooltip: The volume of the siphon sound
ASE.VTImpactEffectTooltip: The impact effect on the target when damaged
ASE.VTImpactSoundTooltip: The sound played with the impact effect
ASE.VTImpactSoundDelayTooltip: The delay before the impact sound plays
ASE.VTMaxStrandsTooltip: The maximum number of energy strands to during the siphon effect
ASE.ActivateWitchBoltDescription: Send a jolt of lightning along the arc.
ASE.AssociatedActorNotFoundNotification: Associated actor for summon not found!
ASE.AnimateDeadDialogNoCorpses: No corpses to raise in range!
ASE.MissileDialogInstructionsA: 'Left-Click' on a token to assign a
ASE.MissileDialogInstructionsD: 'Right-Click on a token to remove a
ASE.ChainLightningNumJumpsLabel: Number of targets to jump to:
ASE.ChainLightningNoTargetSelected: You must select a target to use this spell.
ASE.MirrorImageCreateEffectColorTooltip: Color of the initial 'Burst' effect when spell is cast
ASE.MirrorImageCastSoundTooltip: Sound played when spell is cast
ASE.MirrorImageCastSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the cast sound
ASE.MirrorImageOrbitRadiusTooltip: Radius of the Mirror Image's orbit (10-150 is recommended)
ASE.MirrorImageOrbitDurationTooltip: Duration of the Mirror Image's orbit, aka the speed of the orbit (12-48 is recommended)
ASE.MirrorImageDestroyDelayTooltip: Delay before the Mirror Image is destroyed when hit
ASE.MirrorImageDestroySoundTooltip: Sound played when the Mirror Image is destroyed
ASE.MirrorImageDestroySoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Mirror Image destruction sound
ASE.MirrorImageDestroyVolumeTooltip: Volume of the Mirror Image destruction sound
ASE.MirrorImageDestroyEffectColorTooltip: Color of the Mirror Image destruction effect
ASE.AcidEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Acid effect
ASE.AcidEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Acid effect sound relative to the Acid effect
ASE.AcidEffectSoundSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Acid effect sound
ASE.ColdEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Cold effect
ASE.ColdEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Cold effect sound relative to the Cold effect
ASE.ColdEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Cold effect sound
ASE.FireEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Fire effect
ASE.FireEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Fire effect sound relative to the Fire effect
ASE.FireEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Fire effect sound
ASE.ForceEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Force effect
ASE.ForceEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Force effect sound relative to the Force effect
ASE.ForceEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Force effect sound
ASE.LightningEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Lightning effect
ASE.LightningEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Lightning effect sound relative to the Lightning effect
ASE.LightningEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Lightning effect sound
ASE.PoisonEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Poison effect
ASE.PoisonEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Poison effect sound relative to the Poison effect
ASE.PoisonEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Poison effect sound
ASE.PsychicEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Psychic effect
ASE.PsychicEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Psychic effect sound relative to the Psychic effect
ASE.PsychicEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Psychic effect sound
ASE.ThunderEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Thunder effect
ASE.ThunderEffectSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the Thunder effect sound relative to the Thunder effect
ASE.ThunderEffectSoundVolumeLooltip: Volume of the Thunder effect sound
ASE.ThunderShatterEffectColorTooltip: Color of the Thunder Shatter effect
ASE.ThunderShatterEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played alongside the Thunder Shatter effect
ASE.ThunderShatterEffectSoundDelayToolti: Delay before playing the Thunder Shatter effect sound relative to the Thunder Shatter effect
ASE.ThunderShatterEffectSoundVolumeToolt: Volume of the Thunder Shatter effect sound
ASE.EffectSpeedTooltip: Relative speed of the words flying towards the target, 1 is default, 2 is twice as fast
ASE.FontSizeTooltip: Font size used for the effect
ASE.EffectFillColorATooltip: First fill color used for the effect
ASE.EffectFillColorBTooltip: Second fill color used for the effect
ASE.RandomGlowTooltip: Randomly select a glow color for the effect
ASE.EffectGlowColorTooltip: Glow color used for the effect
ASE.EffectGlowDistanceTooltip: Distance of the glow from the effect
ASE.ViscousMockerySoundTooltip: Sound played when the effect is triggered
ASE.ViscousMockerySoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the effect sound relative to the effect
ASE.WallTypeOptionsTooltip: Which Wall Spell to assign to this effect
ASE.WallRadiusTooltip: Radius of the Wall Spell (in feet)
ASE.WallLengthTooltip: Length of the Wall Spell (in feet)
ASE.WallHeightTooltip: Height of the Wall Spell (in feet)
ASE.WallSegmentSizeTooltip: Size of each panel segment of the Wall Spell (in feet)
ASE.WallPanelCountTooltip: Number of panels in the Wall Spell (1-10)
ASE.WallUseWebPTooltip: Whether or not to use a still image for the effect (for lower performance or network bandwidth issues)
ASE.WallEndPanelPlacementInstruction: Right click any where on the canvas to end placement
ASE.WallWidthTooltip: Width of the Wall Spell (in feet)
ASE.WallOfFireColorTooltip: Color of the Wall of Fire effect
ASE.WallSpellInitialSoundTooltip: Sound played when the spell is cast
ASE.WallSpellInitialSoundDelayTooltip: Delay before playing the cast sound relative to the spell being cast
ASE.WallSpellDamageEffectSoundTooltip: Sound played when the spell effect is triggered(for example, when Wall of Fire deals damage)
ASE.WallSpellDamageEffectSoundDelayToolt: Delay before playing the effect sound relative to the spell effect being triggered
ASE.WallSpellDamageEffectVolumeTooltip: Volume of the effect trigger sound
ASE.WallSpellAlreadyEffected: {name} has already been effected by this {wallName} this turn
